onActionAddApptBtn(ActionEvent) - Method in class View_Controller.AddAppointmentController
This method enables user to add new appointment to database.

This method allows user to cancel adding an appointment.

This method allows user to save customer information.
onActionAddCustomerCancelBtn(ActionEvent) - Method in class View_Controller.AddCustomerController
This method allows user to cancel adding customer.
onActionApptAddBtn(ActionEvent) - Method in class View_Controller.ApptTableViewController
This method button enables user to add a new customer.
onActionApptBackBtn(ActionEvent) - Method in class View_Controller.ApptTableViewController
This method button enables user to go back to previous screen: Welcome screen.
onActionApptDeleteBtn(ActionEvent) - Method in class View_Controller.ApptTableViewController
This method button enables user to delete current appointment selected.
onActionApptUpdateBtn(ActionEvent) - Method in class View_Controller.ApptTableViewController
This method enables user to update appointment information for appointment selected from the table view list.

This method allows user to add customers.

This method allows user to go back to Welcome screen.

This method enables user to delete selected customer.
onActionCustomerUpdateBtn(ActionEvent) - Method in class View_Controller.CustomerTableViewController
This method allows user to select customer and update information.
onActionExit(ActionEvent) - Method in class View_Controller.WelcomeController
This method terminates the app.
onActionFilterAllBtn(ActionEvent) - Method in class View_Controller.ApptTableViewController
This method allows user to list back all appointments.
onActionFilterByMonthBtn(ActionEvent) - Method in class View_Controller.ApptTableViewController
This method allows user to filter appointments by month.
onActionFilterByWeekBtn(ActionEvent) - Method in class View_Controller.ApptTableViewController
This method allows user to filter appointments by week.
onActionLogIn(ActionEvent) - Method in class View_Controller.LogInController
This method allows user to log in to the app.

This method takes user to appointment table view list.
onActionShowCustomerList(ActionEvent) - Method in class View_Controller.WelcomeController
This method takes user to customer table view list.
onActionUpdateApptBtn(ActionEvent) - Method in class View_Controller.UpdateAppointmentController
This class allows user to edit/update appointment information that was previously scheduled and is shown on screen.
